property.name: fetcher.server.delay
property.description: The number of seconds the fetcher will delay between successive requests to the same server.

property.name: http.robots.agents
property.description: The agent strings we'll look for in robots.txt files, comma-separated, in decreasing order of precedence. You should put the value of http.agent.name as the first agent name, and keep the default * at the end of the list. E.g.: BlurflDev,Blurfl,*

property.name: http.timeout
property.description: The default network timeout, in milliseconds.

property.name: urlnormalizer.order
property.description: Order in which normalizers will run. If any of these isn't activated it will be silently skipped. If other normalizers not on the list are activated, they will run in random order after the ones specified here are run.

property.name: urlnormalizer.regex.file
property.description: Name of the config file used by the RegexUrlNormalizer class.

property.name: urlnormalizer.loop.count
property.description: Optionally loop through normalizers several times, to make sure that all transformations have been performed.
